title: Rengar Changes
body:
Hello I'm just going to talk about the champion {{champion:107}} today, about why I think hes unbalanced and give a few options to balance him out a little bit more.

I have versed him countless times as lee sin (tbh Lee is pretty op aswell) But have lost most of the times. I have not often been able to get away because of his passive, and that is what I will talk about here. His passive is way too op, giving him way too much opportunities in game and in the jungle. So I will propose an idea as to a way of balancing this out. It's quite simple really. It is to add a cooldown to the passive. eg: Rengar can leap to a nearby enemy unit while inside brush once every 10 seconds.

If rengar is, APPARENTLY, already balanced please let me know. (Highly unlikely to be honest)

I really hope you take this into consideration, this has given me a lot of trouble and I know a lot of champions are op/broken but Rengar has been for a long time, so I believe he should be next in the line :)
